Name: Alchemia
About the game: Alchemia is a cryptic puzzle game which is solved through research outside of the game. This mysterious 17th century book on alchemy claimed to reveal the secret of the Philosopher's Stone to those who could solve the riddles and ciphers contained within.
Meta Title: Alchemia: Sep 28, 2018, Matthew Brown and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Alchemia? Check out the release date (Sep 28, 2018), developer insights from Matthew Brown, and a complete game summary.
